job_description:
Overview
The Category Planning & Activation Intern will support the category team in analyzing market trends, developing category strategies, and executing activation programs across channels. This role is suitable for students or fresh graduates who want to gain experience in category management, trade marketing, and commercial operations.

Responsibilities
• Assist in collecting and analyzing data related to sales performance, consumer behavior, and market trends.
• Support the development of category plans, including assortment, pricing, and promotional strategies.
• Help prepare presentations, reports, and category insights for internal stakeholders.
• Assist in coordinating activation programs across modern trade, general trade, and e-commerce channels.
• Work closely with cross-functional teams such as Marketing, Sales, and Supply Chain to ensure smooth execution.
• Monitor the performance of category initiatives and compile post-activation evaluations.
• Support administrative tasks including data entry, tracking documents, and maintaining category databases.

Requirements
• Final-year student or fresh graduate in Business, Marketing, Management, or related fields.
• Strong analytical skills and ability to work with data.
• Good communication skills and willingness to collaborate across teams.
• Proficient in Microsoft Excel, PowerPoint, or Google Workspace.
• Detail-oriented and able to manage multiple tasks.
